description: A new sustainable neighbourhood being created alongside 2km of south-facing Thames river frontage. A partnership with The Mayor of London and L&Q, 10,800 new homes will house up to 29,000 people.

events.name: Drop in
events.notes: Emerge East Festival celebrates creativity, community and nature at Barking Riverside - a jam-packed day of activities along the Thames.

factsheet.heading: About Barking Riverside
paragraphs: Barking Riverside is one of Europe's most exciting developments, providing London with thousands of new homes.
Set in a unique location on the Thames, it covers an area as large as Hyde Park. In 2022, a transport interchange hub opened, featuring architectural-led designs and sustainable urban solutions.
Discover this emerging neighbourhood that is redefining what good development looks like.

factsheet.heading: About Emerge East
paragraphs:
Emerge East Festival returns this September, celebrating creativity, community and nature at Barking Riverside.
Overlooking Londonâ€™s iconic River Thames, Barking Riverside is one of Europe's largest and most exciting residential developments, and home to a diverse and active community.
Emerge East is the perfect day to discover this emerging East London neighbourhood, with a packed programme of fun and entertainment.

Taste ethnic home-cooked food, browse local traders and independent makers at the Emerging Makers Market, explore the area's unique ecology through a Wildlife and Wellbeing Trail, enjoy the feel-good benefits of deep heat with a pop-up riverside sauna, and soak up unspoilt views of the Thames while having a freshly made cocktail.
View the full programme at EmergeEast.uk

location.address: Barking Riverside Project Office, Project Road, Barking, IG11 0YP
travel_info: Additional travel info: You can travel to Barking Riverside on the London Overground to Barking Riverside Station, or via the Uber Boat by Thames Clippers to Barking Riverside Pier.

name: Barking Riverside London
